name: Esque
description:
WASD/arrow keys to move

Q to take

E to give

M to mute/unmute the music

Esque:

The hottest new club in town, a series of odd events, a cast of 'colorful' characters and its all open for you tonight.

Inspired by the classic fmv adventure game: mode

Esque was developed from 1/1/2016 to 2/1/2016. We used Crafty.js for object management and Three.js for 3D rendering.

OakmoundStudio is: twohundredscythes, lightningfenrir, lohrez
